announcements.title: Library Catalog downtime
announcements.message: Thursday Dec. 19th, between 9:00 pm and 12:00 am the Central and Pella Public Library catalogs will be unavailable due to scheduled maintenance.

announcements.title: Intern for Study Abroad
announcements.message: Want to have a fun, upbeat internship on campus? Apply for one of Study Abroad's two awesome internships for spring 2014 on CareerLink on my.central.edu.

announcements.title: Go to this career fair over the holiday break!
announcements.message: Attend the IOWA CAREER EXPO Thur. Jan. 9, 10 am - 3 pm, HyVee Hall, downtown Des Moines. Planned by HR professionals, an ideal venue for job or internship hunters!
